Texts.Chs: ^orange;骨制长矛^reset;兼具实用与攻击。^orange;猎刺^reset;视为弓箭伤害，使它成为一种高效的狩猎工具，还能造成出血伤害!此外，你还能够得到更多的^orange;皮革^reset;来制作商品!
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; has a useful alternate attack. ^orange;Hunter's Thrust^reset; counts as bow damage, making it a deadly hunting implement that also causes bleed damage! In turn, you will be able to get more ^orange;Leather^reset; to craft even more goods!

Texts.Chs: 当你没有科技的时候，^orange;骨头^reset;很有用处。试着在你的^green;[C]制造^reset;菜单的武器标签里做一把^orange;骨制长矛^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Bone^reset; is pretty useful when you don't have technology. Try making a ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting^reset; menu under the Weapons tab.
